name: 1 OFF (Low Effort Jam #19)
description:
1 OFF is a minimalist math-game where you need to calculate, memorize, move to the correct (result)position and take 1 off.

We created this game participating Low Effort Jam 19.

Controls
  • move left/right: arrow keys or A/D
  • set result: SPACE
  • quit to main menu: ESC
Credits

Color palette: PEACHY KEEN PALETTE created by dots!

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
